attributes.title: 2017 Audi A4 1.4 TFSI Design Auto

attributes.description: A Luxury 7 Seater SUV With Impressive Tech And Loads Of Space Makes  This Vehicle A Superb Choice. Our 2018 Model Is Presented In White With A Black Leather Interior And Aluminium Trim. It Has Covered 104 000 KM And Retains A Full Service History. Features Include A Panoramic Glass Sunroof, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, LED Intelligent Lights, Electric Folding Mirrors, Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Electric Seats With Memory, Satellite Navigation, Bluetooth, CD Player, USB Input, Preparation For Mercedes Benz Apps, Climate Control, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint, Aluminium Roof Rack, Electric Tailgate And 19 Inch Alloy Wheels. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
